import React, { useState } from "react"; import RTEditor from "../Editor"; import { CourseRequest} from 'services/courses' type DescriptionProps = { handleChange: (value: string) => void, course: CourseRequest, updateCourse: (course: CourseRequest) => void } export const CourseDescription: React.FC = ({ handleChange, course, updateCourse }) => { const [value, setValue ] = useState(''); return (
Tell users what your course is about.

Let your students know what they will get for their time and bucks. You can change it later.

{ setValue(value) handleChange(value) updateCourse({ ...course, description: value }) }} />
); } export default CourseDescription;
